headline: Blackstone Just Made a $4 Billion Power Play--And It Could Reshape the U.S. Grid
summary: AI data centers, soaring electricity demand, and a utility arms race--Blackstone's latest move could signal a new era.

headline: MacLean Power Systems and Power Grid Components Join Forces to Form Leading Supplier of Engineered Components and Solutions for Utility Infrastructure
summary: NEW YORK, December 10, 2025--MacLean Power Systems ("MPS") and Power Grid Components ("PGC"), two leading manufacturers of engineered components and solutions for electrical transmission, distribution, substation and communication infrastructure, announced today the signing of definitive agreements to merge and recapitalize MPS.
